title: Accept Contactless Payments & Cards | Benefits of Mastercard Contactless Payments
description: With Mastercard Contactless payments, allow your customers to make purchases by simply tapping or waving their enabled card or with their phones using mobile NFC.

data.heading: Quick checkout, happy customers
para: Mastercard® contactless helps you serve more customers in less time, which means a boost in sales, customer loyalty and cross-sell opportunities.

data.heading: Safer alternative
para: According to a recent Mastercard survey 79% of respondents worldwide say they are now using contactless payments, citing safety and cleanliness as key drivers.1

data.heading: Increased transaction amounts
para: Mastercard accounts that can make contactless purchases spend more on average than non-contactless accounts.

data.heading: Enhance payment security at the point of sale
para: Tap & Go payments use the same Mastercard network that processes billions of magnetic strip and chip transactions each year.

data.heading: Improved business operations
para: Lower the risks and the costs associated with handling and transporting cash.

data.heading: Added convenience
para: Tap & Go transactions are as easy as they sound – no receipts required and no cardholder verification on transactions under $50.

data.heading: How to accept Mastercard contactless
para:
To accept contactless payments, merchants can choose to implement a plug-in peripheral reader or a fully integrated system.
Contact your acquirer or payment processor to learn how to begin accepting Mastercard contactless payments.

data.heading: Contactless locator
para: Find out which merchants already use contactless.

data.heading: Mastercard Nearby App
para: Find places where Mastercard is accepted.

data.heading: Protect your business
para: Mastercard is committed to keeping your business safer and more secure.

data.heading: Unique and exclusive benefits
para: Mastercard works with partners worldwide to bring your business money-saving offers plus Priceless experiences to share with your customers.

data.heading: How Tap & Go® payments work
para: Customers can pay by tapping or waving their enabled card or smart device on a contactless-enabled point-of-sale (POS) reader.
